content:
Three ships were of the Royal Mail Line were named RMS Magdalena.

RMS Magdalena (1852), an ocean liner used as a troopship during the Crimean War
RMS Magdalena (1889), an ocean liner in service 1889â€“1921
RMS Magdalena (1948), a cargo liner that was wrecked on her maiden voyage in 1949.See also

SS Magdalena, a number of ships with this name
